div.p: Erie Rise Leadership Academy Charter School Board of Trustees, CEO, and staff support a school uniform policy to reduce distraction and competition.
The formation of a Rise parent group began in September, 2011; the initial group was spearheaded by Beverly Davis, Homer Smith, Kim Davis and a small group of parents.
